description: Healthy Carrot Muffins. Full of wholesome ingredients like bran, oats, wholegrain flour, carrots & sultanas plus as an added bonus they are completely oil-free.  Perfect for breakfast, snacks or lunch boxes!
keywords: carrot muffins, healthy carrot muffins, healthy muffins, vegan carrot muffins
name: Healthy Carrot Muffins
recipeIngredient: 96 g / 1/2 cup coconut sugar (, most other sugar will work too)
60 g / 1/2 cup chopped walnuts (, OPTIONAL - omit to make nut-free. Pecans are a great substitute for walnuts )
300 mls / 1 1/4 cups milk of choice (, i used unsweetened milk. Bear in mind that sweetened milk will make the muffins sweeter)
1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar (, or lemon juice)
110 g / 1 cup grated carrot (, if you have a food processor use the grating disc to grate them in seconds)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400Â°F and prepare muffin pan. Grease or line with liners.
Put all of the dry ingredients in a large bowl and stir together to combine well.
Put all of the wet ingredients into a bowl or jug and stir together.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir together to combine but don't overmix.
Spoon evenly into the muffins pan. I found a heaping ice-cream scoop to be about the right amount for each hole.
Bake for around 25 minutes until a toothpick inserted comes out clean then cool on a baking rack.
